gig init one
cd one
gig add hello.txt
gig commit -m 'Initial commit'
# We need this second commit because 'gig show'
# currently cannot show the diff of the initial commit.
gig add world.txt
gig commit -m 'second commit'
cd ..

gig init two
cd two
gig remote add origin $WORK/one
! gig show origin/master
stderr 'reference not found'
gig fetch origin
gig show origin/master
stdout 'second commit'

-- one/hello.txt --
hello world
-- one/world.txt --
hello world
